instructions:
Brown pork in bacon drippings in a frying pan that has a lid and sprinkle with marjoram. Add G
Washington liquid, cover and gently simmer for 10 minutes. In a 1 1/2 quart casserole mix contents of Betty
Crocker box with boiling water, margarine and milk as directed on the box. Add chopped onion.
Remove meat from frying pan and stir meat juices into potato mixture. Gently place pork chops on top of
potatoes and bake uncovered in a 400 F oven for 30 to 35 minutes. 
*(Rev. 11/2/97)*
ingredients: 2 pork blade (or butt) steaks or end of loin chops
1 envelope G Washington Golden seasoning mix,
1 box (5 oz) Betty Crocker Scalloped Potatoes
name: Pork Chops & Scalloped Potatoes
creator: Mary Decker
